product_id.description: Product to receive inventory for (required unless source_from_po is true)

quantity.description: Quantity to receive (required unless source_from_po is true)

location_id.description: Warehouse location to receive inventory into (required unless source_from_po is true)

source_from_po.description: Whether to source product, quantity, and location from the triggering purchase order

po_line_item_id.description: Specific PO line item to receive (used with source_from_po)

reference_number.description: External reference number for the receipt

notes.description: Additional notes for the inventory receipt
